title: The Duchess of Sussex’s ten tourdrobe commandments
text:
The Duchess of Sussex has been changing her outfit several times a day while in South Africa - in fact, her royal tour wardrobe has been something of a fashion who’s who of independent designers, cult brands and high street favourites.

But it has also revealed exactly how Meghan sticks to certain shapes and cuts that she knows suit and flatter her. It’s exposed a distinct personal style - and one that we see more on overseas trips than we do when she’s on engagements back home in the UK.

This is because warmer climates, like that of South Africa, as well as Fiji, Tonga, Australia and New Zealand which she and Harry visited in 2018, call for a more relaxed aesthetic. Gone are the tailored Givenchy...
description: The Duchess of Sussex has been changing her outfit several times a day while in South Africa - in fact, her royal tour wardrobe has been something of a fashion who’s who of independent designers, cult brands and high street favourites.
